apiVersionParameter.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.
apiVersionParameter.name: api-version

get.description: Lists all the available Advisor REST API operations.

parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

operation.description: The action that users can perform, based on their permission level.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

parameters.description: The Azure subscription ID.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The operation ID, which can be found from the Location field in the generate recommendation response header.
parameters.name: operationId

parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

202.description: Accepted. Recommendation generation is in progress.

204.description: NoContent. Recommendation generation has been completed.

get.description: Obtains cached recommendations for a subscription. The recommendations are generated or computed by invoking generateRecommendations.

parameters.description: The Azure subscription ID.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: The filter to apply to the recommendations.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: The number of recommendations per page if a paged version of this API is being used.
parameters.name: $top

parameters.description: The page-continuation token to use with a paged version of this API.
parameters.name: $skipToken

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of recommendations.

impact.description: The business impact of the recommendation.

impactedField.description: The resource type identified by Advisor.

lastUpdated.description: The most recent time that Advisor checked the validity of the recommendation.

risk.description: The potential risk of not implementing the recommendation.

problem.description: The issue or opportunity identified by the recommendation.

solution.description: The remediation action suggested by the recommendation.

suppressionIds.description: The list of snoozed and dismissed rules for the recommendation.

shortDescription.problem: This availability set is not configured for fault tolerance
shortDescription.solution: To ensure high availability add one or more virtual machines to this availability set

parameters.description: The Azure subscription ID.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

200.description: OK. Successfully got all suppressions in a subscription.

items.description: The details of the snoozed or dismissed rule; for example, the duration, name, and GUID associated with the rule.

ttl.description: The duration for which the suppression is valid.

parameters.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource Manager identifier of the resource to which the recommendation applies.
parameters.name: resourceUri

parameters.description: The recommendation ID.
parameters.name: recommendationId

solution.description: The remediation action suggested by the recommendation.

shortDescription.problem: This availability set is not configured for fault tolerance
shortDescription.solution: To ensure high availability add one or more virtual machines to this availability set

delete.description: Enables the activation of a snoozed or dismissed recommendation. The snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation is referred to as a suppression.

parameters.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource Manager identifier of the resource to which the recommendation applies.
parameters.name: resourceUri

parameters.description: The recommendation ID.
parameters.name: recommendationId

parameters.description: The name of the suppression.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

204.description: NoContent. The recommendation has been activated.

get.description: Obtains the details of a suppression.

parameters.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource Manager identifier of the resource to which the recommendation applies.
parameters.name: resourceUri

parameters.description: The recommendation ID.
parameters.name: recommendationId

parameters.description: The name of the suppression.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: The details of the snoozed or dismissed rule; for example, the duration, name, and GUID associated with the rule.

ttl.description: The duration for which the suppression is valid.

put.description: Enables the snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation. The snoozed or dismissed attribute is referred to as a suppression. Use this API to create or update the snoozed or dismissed status of a recommendation.

parameters.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource Manager identifier of the resource to which the recommendation applies.
parameters.name: resourceUri

parameters.description: The recommendation ID.
parameters.name: recommendationId

parameters.description: The name of the suppression.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: The snoozed or dismissed attribute; for example, the snooze duration.
parameters.name: suppressionContract

schema.description: The details of the snoozed or dismissed rule; for example, the duration, name, and GUID associated with the rule.

ttl.description: The duration for which the suppression is valid.
